{{cpp/experimental/reflect/title|Enumerator}}
{{cpp/experimental/reflect/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=reflection_ts | header=experimental/reflect | 1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
concept Enumerator = Typed&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; ScopeMember&lt;T&gt; &amp;&amp; /* see below */;
}}

The {{tt|Enumerator}} concept is satisfied if and only if T reflects an enumerator (Note: The {{tt|Scope}} of an {{tt|Enumerator}} is its type also for enumerations that are unscoped enumeration types).
